import React from "react"; import Footer from "../footer/Footer"; export default function Checkout({cart, isScrolled}) { const subTotal = cart.reduce((a, c) => { return a + (c.furniture.price * c.quantities); }, 0); const shipping = 50; const tax = subTotal * .2; const total = subTotal + shipping + tax; function handleClick() { } return (
{cart.length !== 0 &&

Order Information

{cart.map(item => { return (

{item.furniture.name}

USD {item.furniture.price.toLocaleString()}

x{item.quantities}

) })}

Subtotal

USD {subTotal.toLocaleString()}

Shipping

USD {tax}

Taxes

USD 300

Total

USD 22,000

Shipping Information

First Name

Last Name

Address

Phone

Payment Information

Card Number

Cardholder Name

Expiration Date

Security Code

}
) }
